title: Derek
description: BrittanyHe watched me from afar for over a year.Everywhere I went, he was there. His eyes on me.Little by little, he got closer. He stalked his preyâ€¦and that prey was me.But I wanted to be caught.I wanted to be his.I wanted him just as much as he wanted me.So I gave into him.I was his.DerekShe was mine.She had been from the second her eyes connected with mine from across the room.I waited.I watched and when she was ready, she became mine.She owned all of me, heart and soul, and I owned every single piece of her.Problem was, someone else decided they wanted her too.But nobody threatens her and lives to tell the story.Author Note:This book comes with a HEA, along with an over the top alpha male obsessed with his woman. Proceed with caution, if you dare. ;)
author: LeAnn Ashers
